participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and health-conscious, Alex enjoys physical fitness and has a nurturing side, evident from her love for her dogs.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.
